GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.37 to before v6.0.10
GSD.description:
ata: libata-transport: fix error handling in ata_tdev_add()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.10 by commit f54331962883f4fc4bf5e487e6e7cf07c4567fef, it was introduced in version v2.6.37 by commit d9027470b88631d0956ac37cdadfdeb9cdcf2c99. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ata: libata-transport: fix error handling in ata_tdev_add()
